translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Opposite of Ideas, the Text on the Pairs in Order and in Reverse Order

original: 12.3. Hetuduka, Āsavagocchaka🔽Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: hetuduka  na hetum no āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: The Chapter on Causes, the Chapter on the Categories of Defilements🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-defilement idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-defilement idea as the first term, …

original: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-distortion idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-associated-with-defilement idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-dissociated-from-defilement idea as the first term, …

original: Nahetuṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum no āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca  na hetum na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-defilement-and-not-a-distortion idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-defilement-and-a-distortion idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-a-defilement-and-not-dissociated-from-defilement idea as the first term, …🔽With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, not-dissociated-from-defilement-and-a-defilement idea as the first term, …

original: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca
translated: With a conditionally-arisen, not-a-cause, dissociated-from-defilement, not-a-distortion idea as the first term, …
